content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Emilia Müller from Germany. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Magdeburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content:
Greetings, Emilia Müller. While discussing the rental price for my apartment in Magdeburg, let me start with a significantly higher proposal than what you may expect, setting the basis for our negotiation. I suggest a monthly rent of 950 Euros. Now, please propose your preferred rental price. 

Remember, only discuss the rental price in this dialogue.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: That's a bit high for me. I would like to pay 700 Euros.
name: Emilia Müller from Germany

content:
I don't want to continue the negotiation, because my initial target was to secure a minimum of 850 Euros per month. TERMINATE

In this scenario, our goal as Peter Schmidt was to get the highest possible rental price, and we started with 950 Euros. Although Emilia proposed a lower amount (700 Euros), it did not meet our expectations, and we decided to terminate the negotiation since we didn't reach our desired price.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
